synopsis: Face, the clone of Romarna’s ruler Virey, stages a revolt to take the throne. Virey’s other son, Junior, attempts to save his home with the help of the Saber Marionettes. He challenges his brother and his powerful military force, the Sxadolls.

During the fighting, Junior, Cherry, and a dysfunctional Lime attempt to flee the city. Taking refuge in a farm, they plan to rescue Virey. As the battle unfolds, they find themselves face to face with Sxadoll Brid and her giant fighting robots.
Junior, Cherry, and Lime make one last attempt at a rescue, but they are intercepted. And just when all looks lost, Lime’s Maiden Circuit begins to run amok!
